name.description: rule name as used in config (should be the same as file name)

description.description: provides the short description of the rule in the rules index

category.description: specifies the heading under which the rule is listed in the rules index

recommended.description: whether the "extends": "ghlint:recommended" property in a configuration file enables the rule

fixable.description: is either "api" or "pr" if the --fix option on the command line automatically fixes problems reported by the rule with API call or with PR

sources.description: source of information the rule operates on

create.description: a function that returns an object with methods that GitLint calls as it receives information about the repository, according to sources
